text: Tool/framework/language is not company-specific, not product-specfic. They are just too general. Every product need to narrow down the flexibillity of the platform/tools to have a product-specific litte framework. What is lacking here is: for the little product-specific framework, there are too many escape hatches to allow "ugly hacks" to happen.
